content: > want more beautiful free patterns sign up for our newsletter 1 and follow us on instagram @eweknitto 2 so you never miss a pattern > find the kit here 3 designed by claudia q for eweknit soft and fuzzy hat to keep you toasty and warm throughout the winter it is comprised of simple ribbing and stockinette making it a quick and easy knit that will fly off your needles in no time intermediate beginner **sizes** 1 2 circumference 19 1/2 21 / 49 5 53 cm length with brim folded 9 1/2 / 24 cm to fit snug with approx 1-2 / 2 5-5 cm negative ease shown in size 2 **yarn** a - sandnes garn sunday petiteknit 100% merino 257 yards per 50 gram skein 1 skein b - isager silk mohair 75% mohair 25% silk 230 yards / 212 meters per 25g 1 skein **needles** a 4 00 mm us 6 circular needle 16 / 40 cm long and a set of 4 00 mm us 6 double pointed needles dpn s or needle in your preferred style for working small circumferences in the round or needles required to obtain correct gauge **gauge** 22 5 sts & 29 row = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette / stocking stitch with yarns a and b held together on 4 00 mm us 8 needle **notions** 1 stitch marker tapestry needle for pattern support patterns@eweknit ca 1 https //eweknit-store us7 list-manage com/subscribe/post u=d1440342032269e6f7794a987&id=7952e97f67 2 https //www instagram com/eweknitto/ 3 https //www instagram com/eweknitto/ 4 eweknit co
